## HoverLinkSource interface


## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [`defaultMod`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/HoverLinkSource/defaultMod.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Whether the <code>hover-link</code> event requires the 'Mod' key to be pressed to trigger. |
|  [`display`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/HoverLinkSource/display.md) |  | <code>string</code> | Text displayed in the 'Page preview' plugin settings. It should match the plugin's display name. |
